text: Doljani is populated place in Jablanica Municipality, Bosnia and Hercegovina, between Jablanica and Mostar. This village lies along the Doljanka river (which was named after it) Doljani are located in the northern Herzegovina, in the northeastern part of the Nature Park "Blidinje". Elevation ranges from 600 to 750 meters in the place. The highest peaks that surround the village are Baćin (1,282 m), Borovinka (1430 m), and Vitlenica (1655 m) Throughout the Doljani valley flowing the river Doljanka.Spahić M. et al. (2000): Bosna i Hercegovina (1:250.000).
